about.headline: About Me
about.bio:
I'm George, an AI Engineer at IBM with two years of experience delivering AI-driven solutions across the Banking, Financial Services, Mining, and Healthcare industries. 
My work focuses on Data Management & Transformation, Generative AI and intelligent agents, Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), data migration, and reporting systems.
 I hold an MSc in Business Analytics from Bayes Business School (UK) and a BSc in Accounting and Finance from the Athens University of Economics and Business (Greece). 

Beyond my professional work, I have a deep passion for exploring new frameworks and techniques in the field of Generative AI. I regularly write about my learnings and insights on Medium, where Iâ€™m a proud contributor to Towards Data Science.
